about.title: About Us
about.description: Welcome to the Fatwa application! We are here to provide religious fatwas and answer your religious questions. Our team of scholars and specialists strive to provide accurate and comprehensive answers that meet the needs of the Muslim community. We aim to enhance the correct understanding of Islam and provide the necessary guidance for those seeking religious knowledge.

donate.title: Donate
donate.first_paragraph: Your donations help us continue providing Islamic services and supporting the Muslim community. All donations go directly to support our charitable projects and to improve the platform to meet your needs. Your donation contributes to spreading knowledge and calling to Allah. Thank you for your support.
donate.second_paragraph: You can easily donate by selecting the appropriate amount and using the available payment methods. We appreciate every contribution you make to support our work.
